#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test_cases;
    scanf("%d",&test_cases);
    string sol[test_cases];
    char s[100001];
    int count=0;
    bool possible;
    for(int i=0;i<test_cases;i++)
    {
        count=0;
        possible=true;
        scanf("%s",s);
        int len=strlen(s);
        if(len%2!=0)
        {
            possible=false;
        }
        else{
        for(int j=0;j<len;j++)
        {
            if(s[j]=='T')
            {
                count++;
            }
            else if(s[j]=='D')
            {
                count--;
                if(count<0)
                {
                    possible=false;
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        }
        if(!possible)
            sol[i]="NO";
        else
        {    if(count==0)
                sol[i]="YES";
            else
                sol[i]="NO";
        }
    }
    for(int i=0;i<test_cases;i++)
        cout<<sol[i]<<endl;
}
